text.zh: 晚上十點的便利商店發票
牛魔王 IG 鬼屋進場打卡貼文

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: Oh no, Master has gone missing! What should I do?Got it! I'll ask around to see if anyone has seen Master first! He must have been kidnapped by someone here!Let's see...Ah-ha! Here's a map of where everyone lives. I'd better get moving if I'm going to save Master!Hmm... First, I should go see Spider Spirit/Bull Demon King/Buddha to ask if they have any information regarding Master's whereabouts.

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 怎麼辦⋯師父不見了該怎麼辦呢⋯我想到了！我先去問問其他人有沒有看到師父！師父一定是被其中一個人抓走了！讓我找找⋯有了，這裡有張地圖，上面有大家的住處，趕快出發去拯救師父吧！嗯⋯我先去找蜘蛛精問問看有沒有師父的消息吧。

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: Greetings Buddha, I would like to...

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 如來佛您好，我想⋯

en.name: Buddha
en.sentence: Urgh! I've been absolutely swamped with work! Could I get you to take some official documents to the government official in the desert, get his signature, and bring them back? The official documents are on the 3rd floor, by Tripitaka Library's large books area, but the serial number is a little smudged. Anyway, I'm counting on you!

zh.name: 如來佛
zh.sentence: 哎呀，最近真是忙得不可開交啊！你可以先幫我把公文拿去給沙漠的公務員簽名再拿回來嗎？公文位在3樓藏經閣大本書區旁，但是公文的編號有點汙損了，拜託你了！

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: Great! Now I need to get back to Buddha!

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 太好了，趕快回去找如來佛吧！

en.name: Buddha
en.sentence: Thank you very much, little one. Was there something you wanted to ask me?

zh.name: 如來佛
zh.sentence: 真是謝謝你呀小朋友，有什麼事情要找我的嗎？

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: My master went missing yesterday. Did you happen to see anyone suspicious? And also, what were you doing all day yesterday?

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 我的師父昨天失蹤了，想問問你有沒有看到什麼可疑的人？還有你昨天都在做些什麼呢？

en.name: Buddha
en.sentence: Hmmm, let's see ⋯the other deities and I took a day trip yesterday. We got on the bus at 8:30 a.m. and returned home at 6:30 p.m.. Once we got back, we went to a buffet restaurant. As far as I can recall, we ate till around 8:30 p.m.. I was actually a little tired and wanted to head home to rest, but the others wanted to carry on the night at a Japanese bar and wouldn't let me leave. The whole thing eventually ended at 10:00 p.m., and by that time, I was so tired! I can prove what I said on Instagram. If you don't believe me, you can look at the photos!Oh, by the way, while waiting for our dinner, I saw Spider Spirit wandering around the nearby park. I wonder what she might have been doing. Anyway, if there's nothing else, you'd better hurry on your way. Thanks for helping me with the official documents.

zh.name: 如來佛
zh.sentence: 嗯⋯昨天是我們神仙團出遊的日子。我們搭早上八點半的車，一路玩到晚上六點半回來。回來之後我們去吃到飽餐廳，我記得吃到晚上八點半吧，我本來有點累想回家休息，但他們硬拉著我去居酒屋續攤，搞到十點才散會，真是累死我了。我說的這些話都是有IG照片佐證的，不信的話給你看。對了，我們要吃飯時我看到蜘蛛精在旁邊的公園閒晃，不知道在幹嘛。好啦，沒事的話就趕快離開吧，謝謝你幫我跑公文啊！

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: Alright, thanks Buddha!

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 好的謝謝如來佛！

en.name: Red Child
en.sentence: Hey Mister, what are you doing in front of our house?

zh.name: 紅孩兒
zh.sentence: 大哥哥，你在我家門口要幹嘛？

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: There's some stuff I need to ask Bull Demon King. Could you let me in?

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 我有事想請問牛魔王，可以讓我進你們家嗎？

en.name: Red Child
en.sentence: You're looking for my father? Sure, but first, you have to help me finish my assignment. Only then will I let you talk to my father.

zh.name: 紅孩兒
zh.sentence: 要找我爸爸？可以是可以啦，不過你要先幫我完成我的暑假作業，我才讓你去找爸爸。

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: Alright. Master said that the path to happiness lies in helping others. I'll lend you a hand.

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 好啊。師父說助人為快樂之本，讓我來幫你吧。

en.name: Red Child
en.sentence: Okay, before we start working on the assignment, let's find a place to sit.

zh.name: 紅孩兒
zh.sentence: 那在寫作業之前，我們先找個位置坐下吧。

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: Done!

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 完成了。

en.name: Red Child
en.sentence: Wow! Thanks Mister! Let's put the chairs back before heading to my house, shall we? Oh, and we have to keep the space clean.

zh.name: 紅孩兒
zh.sentence: 哇！謝謝你大哥哥。那我們先把座位歸還再去我們家吧！對了，要記得保持座位的清潔唷。

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: Hey Bull Demon King, sorry to disturb you, but I would like to ask you some questions, and I would appreciate if you could please answer them honestly.

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 不好意思打擾了，牛魔王先生，我想請教您一些問題，如果可以的話還請誠實回答。

en.name: Bull Demon King
en.sentence: What's the matter? Why are you so serious...?

zh.name: 牛魔王
zh.sentence: 發生什麼事了？這麼凝重⋯

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: My master has been kidnapped... so I'm looking for any clues that may be helpful. Now that you know, I'll start asking. What were you doing all day yesterday?

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 我的師父遭到綁架了⋯所以我想找尋任何有用的線索。那我就直接提問了，請問您昨天那天在做什麼呢？

en.name: Bull Demon King
en.sentence: I took my wife and my child to the theme park and we went in at about 5:00 p.m.. My family loves thrilling rides like roller coasters, haunted houses, free falls and broken track coasters. Oh, the heart-dropping sensation! The feeling of complete and utter helplessness! Oh my gosh, how I love the adrenaline pumping through my veins! The attraction that we were most looking forward to was the haunted house adventure that started at 7:30 p.m.. This was their special highlight, a hair-raising adventure for 2 hours. But I was quite disappointed, as the haunted house seemed to be a little short on spooks. I wasn't able to fully enjoy the adrenaline rush that came with being frightened.

zh.name: 牛魔王
zh.sentence: 我帶著我老婆還有小孩去遊樂園玩，我們差不多下午五點進場。我們一家人都很喜歡刺激型的遊樂設施，像是雲霄飛車、鬼屋、自由落體、斷軌這類的，讓人的心臟變得酥麻麻的感覺，真是讓人深陷其中難以自拔。原本最期待的行程是晚上七點半開始的鬼屋冒險，這是他們的特別企劃，長達兩小時的刺激探險。不過有點小可惜的是，我覺得鬼屋的鬼好像有點少，不能好好享受驚嚇的快感。

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: And after you left?

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 那離場之後呢？

en.name: Bull Demon King
en.sentence: After we were done with the haunted house, Red Child said she was sleepy, so we left the theme park. We headed back to the car park and it took us about half an hour to drive home.Oh, that's right! Here's our check-in photo at the entrance of the theme park. And here's a photo of us that we bought at the haunted house.

zh.name: 牛魔王
zh.sentence: 結束鬼屋冒險後，紅孩兒說想睡覺了，我們就直接離場。回到停車場開車，大概開了半小時到家。對了，這裡有我們在遊樂園門口的打卡圖跟我們在鬼屋買的合照。

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: Got it! Thanks for your help, Bull Demon King.It seems that Bull Demon King is a good guy. So who could the kidnapper be? No time to waste. I'd better look for someone else to ask!

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 知道了，謝謝您的協助，牛魔王先生。看來牛魔王是個好人，那誰會是抓走師父的犯人呢？

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: What a mess! Why is Spider Spirit's home so messy? Whatever...that's none of my business. I'd better hurry and head in.Spider Spirit is a likely suspect. I should ask her a few questions.Huh? That's strange, Spider Spirit is asleep in the middle of the day? Perhaps I shouldn't wake her up. Hmm... what should I do then?Ouch! What is this shiny thing? It's so bright and it's hurting my eyes!Oh, it's just a disc reflecting light. Oh well, since I can't ask Spider Spirit for information, I might as well have a look at this.

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 真是的，蜘蛛精家裡怎麼這麼亂。算了不管了，還是趕快進去。蜘蛛精感覺嫌疑重大，問問他吧。咦，大白天的蜘蛛精就在睡覺，這樣叫醒他好像不太好，該怎麼做呢⋯。唉唷！怎麼有個亮亮的東西照得我眼睛好不舒服。原來是一片光碟在反光，既然不能問蜘蛛精，那就拿來看看吧。

en.name: Spider Spirit
en.sentence: Okay, out with it. Why are you here? It'd better be something important. It's so hard to get a day off, and here you are, disturbing my beauty sleep.

zh.name: 蜘蛛精
zh.sentence: 好了，說說你是來做什麼的。最好是重要的事，難得休假，你這樣可是會打擾到我睡美容覺的時間～

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: My master disappeared yesterday. Did you, by any chance, notice anyone suspicious? Also, could you tell me what you were doing all day yesterday?

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 我的師父在昨天失蹤了，想問問你有沒有看到什麼可疑的人？還有想請問你昨天都在做些什麼呢？

en.name: Spider Spirit
en.sentence: Yesterday? I started work at 12:00 p.m. and worked for 8 hours straight. I was so tired. I was on the verge of collapsing. How would I have the energy to pay attention to such things? What's more, I was supposed to be in charge of the cashier, but because there weren't enough actors in the haunted house, I was asked to help out and act as a ghost! Tiring as hell! Once I got off work, I went to the convenience store to buy some instant noodles, and then came home to sleep. I don't have any helpful information. Please leave.

zh.name: 蜘蛛精
zh.sentence: 昨天哦，我從中午十二點連續上了八個小時的班，我都快累癱了，誰還會注意啊。而且我明明就是負責櫃檯收銀的，還因為鬼屋人手不足被叫去幫忙當鬼，累死我了。我下班後去便利商店買個泡麵就回家睡覺了，沒什麼能幫你的啦，快走吧。

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: In that case, do you have any evidence to back up what you said?

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 那你有什麼東西可以證明你說的是真的呢？

en.name: Spider Spirit
en.sentence: Augh⋯you are so annoying. Why do you have so many questions? Take a look at this. I checked in on Instagram when I was working. Oh, and this. This is my receipt from the convenience store where I had my dinner at 10:00 p.m.. These prove my innocence, right? Now hurry up and get out.

zh.name: 蜘蛛精
zh.sentence: 嘖嘖，你這人真煩，問東問西的。拿去看啦，我上班時有在IG打卡；喔還有這個，我晚上十點在便利商店買晚餐的發票。這樣可以證明我的清白了吧，快走快走。

en.name: Spider Spirit
en.sentence: Hmm...? What's that strange sound? Hey you! What're you doing?

zh.name: 蜘蛛精
zh.sentence: ⋯怎麼有奇怪的聲音？喂，你在幹什麼！

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 呃⋯呃⋯

en.name: Spider Spirit
en.sentence: You're holding my disc! You little thief! I'm calling the police to arrest you!

zh.name: 蜘蛛精
zh.sentence: 你的手上竟然還拿著我的光碟！臭小偷！我要報警把你抓起來！

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: Hold on! I am...

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 等等，我是⋯

en.name: Spider Spirit
en.sentence: Not another word! Return my stuff to where you found it now!

zh.name: 蜘蛛精
zh.sentence: 別再說了，還不快點把我的東西歸位！

hints.en: Draw the equation line segment on the transparent sheet
hints.zh: 將方程式線段畫上透明片

hints.en: Stack the transparent pieces of each part

en.sentence: Oh no, Master has gone missing! What should I do?Got it! I'll ask around to see if anyone has seen Master first! He must have been kidnapped by someone here!Let's see...Ah-ha! Here's a map of where everyone lives. I'd better get moving if I'm going to save Master!Hmm... First, I should go see Spider Spirit/Bull Demon King/Buddha to ask if they have any information regarding Master's whereabouts.

zh.sentence: 怎麼辦⋯師父不見了該怎麼辦呢⋯我想到了！我先去問問其他人有沒有看到師父！師父一定是被其中一個人抓走了！讓我找找⋯有了，這裡有張地圖，上面有大家的住處，趕快出發去拯救師父吧！嗯⋯我先去找蜘蛛精問問看有沒有師父的消息吧。

en.sentence: Greetings Buddha, I would like to...

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 如來佛您好，我想⋯

The official documents are on the 3rd floor, by Tripitaka Library's large books area, but the serial number is a little smudged. Anyway, I'm counting on you!

zh.sentence: 哎呀，最近真是忙得不可開交啊！你可以先幫我把公文拿去給沙漠的公務員簽名再拿回來嗎？公文位在3樓藏經閣大本書區旁，但是公文的編號有點汙損了，拜託你了！

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: Great! Now I need to get back to Buddha!

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 太好了，趕快回去找如來佛吧！

en.name: Buddha
en.sentence: Thank you very much, little one. Was there something you wanted to ask me?

zh.name: 如來佛
zh.sentence: 真是謝謝你呀小朋友，有什麼事情要找我的嗎？

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: My master went missing yesterday. Did you happen to see anyone suspicious? And also, what were you doing all day yesterday?

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 我的師父昨天失蹤了，想問問你有沒有看到什麼可疑的人？還有你昨天都在做些什麼呢？

en.name: Buddha
en.sentence: Hmmm, let's see ⋯the other deities and I took a day trip yesterday. We got on the bus at 8:30 a.m. and returned home at 6:30 p.m.. Once we got back, we went to a buffet restaurant. As far as I can recall, we ate till around 8:30 p.m.. I was actually a little tired and wanted to head home to rest, but the others wanted to carry on the night at a Japanese bar and wouldn't let me leave. The whole thing eventually ended at 10:00 p.m., and by that time, I was so tired! I can prove what I said on Instagram. If you don't believe me, you can look at the photos!Oh, by the way, while waiting for our dinner, I saw Spider Spirit wandering around the nearby park. I wonder what she might have been doing. Anyway, if there's nothing else, you'd better hurry on your way. Thanks for helping me with the official documents.

zh.name: 如來佛
zh.sentence: 嗯⋯昨天是我們神仙團出遊的日子。我們搭早上八點半的車，一路玩到晚上六點半回來。回來之後我們去吃到飽餐廳，我記得吃到晚上八點半吧，我本來有點累想回家休息，但他們硬拉著我去居酒屋續攤，搞到十點才散會，真是累死我了。我說的這些話都是有IG照片佐證的，不信的話給你看。對了，我們要吃飯時我看到蜘蛛精在旁邊的公園閒晃，不知道在幹嘛。好啦，沒事的話就趕快離開吧，謝謝你幫我跑公文啊！

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: Alright, thanks Buddha!

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 好的謝謝如來佛！

en.name: Red Child
en.sentence: Hey Mister, what are you doing in front of our house?

zh.name: 紅孩兒
zh.sentence: 大哥哥，你在我家門口要幹嘛？

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: There's some stuff I need to ask Bull Demon King. Could you let me in?

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 我有事想請問牛魔王，可以讓我進你們家嗎？

en.name: Red Child
en.sentence: You're looking for my father? Sure, but first, you have to help me finish my assignment. Only then will I let you talk to my father.

zh.name: 紅孩兒
zh.sentence: 要找我爸爸？可以是可以啦，不過你要先幫我完成我的暑假作業，我才讓你去找爸爸。

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: Alright. Master said that the path to happiness lies in helping others. I'll lend you a hand.

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 好啊。師父說助人為快樂之本，讓我來幫你吧。

en.name: Red Child
en.sentence: Okay, before we start working on the assignment, let's find a place to sit.

zh.name: 紅孩兒
zh.sentence: 那在寫作業之前，我們先找個位置坐下吧。

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: Done!

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 完成了。

en.name: Red Child
en.sentence: Wow! Thanks Mister! Let's put the chairs back before heading to my house, shall we? Oh, and we have to keep the space clean.

zh.name: 紅孩兒
zh.sentence: 哇！謝謝你大哥哥。那我們先把座位歸還再去我們家吧！對了，要記得保持座位的清潔唷。

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: Hey Bull Demon King, sorry to disturb you, but I would like to ask you some questions, and I would appreciate if you could please answer them honestly.

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 不好意思打擾了，牛魔王先生，我想請教您一些問題，如果可以的話還請誠實回答。

en.name: Bull Demon King
en.sentence: What's the matter? Why are you so serious...?

zh.name: 牛魔王
zh.sentence: 發生什麼事了？這麼凝重⋯

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: My master has been kidnapped... so I'm looking for any clues that may be helpful. Now that you know, I'll start asking. What were you doing all day yesterday?

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 我的師父遭到綁架了⋯所以我想找尋任何有用的線索。那我就直接提問了，請問您昨天那天在做什麼呢？

en.name: Bull Demon King
en.sentence: I took my wife and my child to the theme park and we went in at about 5:00 p.m.. My family loves thrilling rides like roller coasters, haunted houses, free falls and broken track coasters. Oh, the heart-dropping sensation! The feeling of complete and utter helplessness! Oh my gosh, how I love the adrenaline pumping through my veins! The attraction that we were most looking forward to was the haunted house adventure that started at 7:30 p.m.. This was their special highlight, a hair-raising adventure for 2 hours. But I was quite disappointed, as the haunted house seemed to be a little short on spooks. I wasn't able to fully enjoy the adrenaline rush that came with being frightened.

zh.sentence: 我帶著我老婆還有小孩去遊樂園玩，我們差不多下午五點進場。我們一家人都很喜歡刺激型的遊樂設施，像是雲霄飛車、鬼屋、自由落體、斷軌這類的，讓人的心臟變得酥麻麻的感覺，真是讓人深陷其中難以自拔。原本最期待的行程是晚上七點半開始的鬼屋冒險，這是他們的特別企劃，長達兩小時的刺激探險。不過有點小可惜的是，我覺得鬼屋的鬼好像有點少，不能好好享受驚嚇的快感。

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: And after you left?

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 那離場之後呢？

en.name: Bull Demon King
en.sentence: After we were done with the haunted house, Red Child said she was sleepy, so we left the theme park. We headed back to the car park and it took us about half an hour to drive home.Oh, that's right! Here's our check-in photo at the entrance of the theme park. And here's a photo of us that we bought at the haunted house.

zh.name: 牛魔王
zh.sentence: 結束鬼屋冒險後，紅孩兒說想睡覺了，我們就直接離場。回到停車場開車，大概開了半小時到家。對了，這裡有我們在遊樂園門口的打卡圖跟我們在鬼屋買的合照。

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: Got it! Thanks for your help, Bull Demon King.It seems that Bull Demon King is a good guy. So who could the kidnapper be? No time to waste. I'd better look for someone else to ask!

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 知道了，謝謝您的協助，牛魔王先生。看來牛魔王是個好人，那誰會是抓走師父的犯人呢？

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: What a mess! Why is Spider Spirit's home so messy? Whatever...that's none of my business. I'd better hurry and head in.Spider Spirit is a likely suspect. I should ask her a few questions.Huh? That's strange, Spider Spirit is asleep in the middle of the day? Perhaps I shouldn't wake her up. Hmm... what should I do then?Ouch! What is this shiny thing? It's so bright and it's hurting my eyes!Oh, it's just a disc reflecting light. Oh well, since I can't ask Spider Spirit for information, I might as well have a look at this.

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 真是的，蜘蛛精家裡怎麼這麼亂。算了不管了，還是趕快進去。蜘蛛精感覺嫌疑重大，問問他吧。咦，大白天的蜘蛛精就在睡覺，這樣叫醒他好像不太好，該怎麼做呢⋯。唉唷！怎麼有個亮亮的東西照得我眼睛好不舒服。原來是一片光碟在反光，既然不能問蜘蛛精，那就拿來看看吧。

en.name: Spider Spirit
en.sentence: Okay, out with it. Why are you here? It'd better be something important. It's so hard to get a day off, and here you are, disturbing my beauty sleep.

zh.name: 蜘蛛精
zh.sentence: 好了，說說你是來做什麼的。最好是重要的事，難得休假，你這樣可是會打擾到我睡美容覺的時間～

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: My master disappeared yesterday. Did you, by any chance, notice anyone suspicious? Also, could you tell me what you were doing all day yesterday?

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 我的師父在昨天失蹤了，想問問你有沒有看到什麼可疑的人？還有想請問你昨天都在做些什麼呢？

en.name: Spider Spirit
en.sentence: Yesterday? I started work at 12:00 p.m. and worked for 8 hours straight. I was so tired. I was on the verge of collapsing. How would I have the energy to pay attention to such things? What's more, I was supposed to be in charge of the cashier, but because there weren't enough actors in the haunted house, I was asked to help out and act as a ghost! Tiring as hell! Once I got off work, I went to the convenience store to buy some instant noodles, and then came home to sleep. I don't have any helpful information. Please leave.

zh.name: 蜘蛛精
zh.sentence: 昨天哦，我從中午十二點連續上了八個小時的班，我都快累癱了，誰還會注意啊。而且我明明就是負責櫃檯收銀的，還因為鬼屋人手不足被叫去幫忙當鬼，累死我了。我下班後去便利商店買個泡麵就回家睡覺了，沒什麼能幫你的啦，快走吧。

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: In that case, do you have any evidence to back up what you said?

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 那你有什麼東西可以證明你說的是真的呢？

en.name: Spider Spirit
en.sentence: Augh⋯you are so annoying. Why do you have so many questions? Take a look at this. I checked in on Instagram when I was working. Oh, and this. This is my receipt from the convenience store where I had my dinner at 10:00 p.m.. These prove my innocence, right? Now hurry up and get out.

zh.name: 蜘蛛精
zh.sentence: 嘖嘖，你這人真煩，問東問西的。拿去看啦，我上班時有在IG打卡；喔還有這個，我晚上十點在便利商店買晚餐的發票。這樣可以證明我的清白了吧，快走快走。

en.name: Spider Spirit
en.sentence: Hmm...? What's that strange sound? Hey you! What're you doing?

zh.name: 蜘蛛精
zh.sentence: ⋯怎麼有奇怪的聲音？喂，你在幹什麼！

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 呃⋯呃⋯

en.name: Spider Spirit
en.sentence: You're holding my disc! You little thief! I'm calling the police to arrest you!

zh.name: 蜘蛛精
zh.sentence: 你的手上竟然還拿著我的光碟！臭小偷！我要報警把你抓起來！

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: Hold on! I am...

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 等等，我是⋯

en.name: Spider Spirit
en.sentence: Not another word! Return my stuff to where you found it now!

zh.name: 蜘蛛精
zh.sentence: 別再說了，還不快點把我的東西歸位！

hints.en: Draw the equation line segment on the transparent sheet
hints.zh: 將方程式線段畫上透明片

hints.en: Stack the transparent pieces of each part

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: Oh no, Master has gone missing! What should I do?Got it! I'll ask around to see if anyone has seen Master first! He must have been kidnapped by someone here!Let's see...Ah-ha! Here's a map of where everyone lives. I'd better get moving if I'm going to save Master!Hmm... First, I should go see Spider Spirit/Bull Demon King/Buddha to ask if they have any information regarding Master's whereabouts.

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 怎麼辦⋯師父不見了該怎麼辦呢⋯我想到了！我先去問問其他人有沒有看到師父！師父一定是被其中一個人抓走了！讓我找找⋯有了，這裡有張地圖，上面有大家的住處，趕快出發去拯救師父吧！嗯⋯我先去找蜘蛛精問問看有沒有師父的消息吧。

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: Greetings Buddha, I would like to...

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 如來佛您好，我想⋯

en.name: Buddha
en.sentence: Urgh! I've been absolutely swamped with work! Could I get you to take some official documents to the government official in the desert, get his signature, and bring them back? The official documents are on the 3rd floor, by Tripitaka Library's large books area, but the serial number is a little smudged. Anyway, I'm counting on you!

zh.name: 如來佛
zh.sentence: 哎呀，最近真是忙得不可開交啊！你可以先幫我把公文拿去給沙漠的公務員簽名再拿回來嗎？公文位在3樓藏經閣大本書區旁，但是公文的編號有點汙損了，拜託你了！

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: Great! Now I need to get back to Buddha!

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 太好了，趕快回去找如來佛吧！

en.name: Buddha
en.sentence: Thank you very much, little one. Was there something you wanted to ask me?

zh.name: 如來佛
zh.sentence: 真是謝謝你呀小朋友，有什麼事情要找我的嗎？

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: My master went missing yesterday. Did you happen to see anyone suspicious? And also, what were you doing all day yesterday?

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 我的師父昨天失蹤了，想問問你有沒有看到什麼可疑的人？還有你昨天都在做些什麼呢？

en.name: Buddha
en.sentence: Hmmm, let's see ⋯the other deities and I took a day trip yesterday. We got on the bus at 8:30 a.m. and returned home at 6:30 p.m.. Once we got back, we went to a buffet restaurant. As far as I can recall, we ate till around 8:30 p.m.. I was actually a little tired and wanted to head home to rest, but the others wanted to carry on the night at a Japanese bar and wouldn't let me leave. The whole thing eventually ended at 10:00 p.m., and by that time, I was so tired! I can prove what I said on Instagram. If you don't believe me, you can look at the photos!Oh, by the way, while waiting for our dinner, I saw Spider Spirit wandering around the nearby park. I wonder what she might have been doing. Anyway, if there's nothing else, you'd better hurry on your way. Thanks for helping me with the official documents.

zh.name: 如來佛
zh.sentence: 嗯⋯昨天是我們神仙團出遊的日子。我們搭早上八點半的車，一路玩到晚上六點半回來。回來之後我們去吃到飽餐廳，我記得吃到晚上八點半吧，我本來有點累想回家休息，但他們硬拉著我去居酒屋續攤，搞到十點才散會，真是累死我了。我說的這些話都是有IG照片佐證的，不信的話給你看。對了，我們要吃飯時我看到蜘蛛精在旁邊的公園閒晃，不知道在幹嘛。好啦，沒事的話就趕快離開吧，謝謝你幫我跑公文啊！

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: Alright, thanks Buddha!

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 好的謝謝如來佛！

en.name: Red Child
en.sentence: Hey Mister, what are you doing in front of our house?

zh.name: 紅孩兒
zh.sentence: 大哥哥，你在我家門口要幹嘛？

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: There's some stuff I need to ask Bull Demon King. Could you let me in?

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 我有事想請問牛魔王，可以讓我進你們家嗎？

en.name: Red Child
en.sentence: You're looking for my father? Sure, but first, you have to help me finish my assignment. Only then will I let you talk to my father.

zh.name: 紅孩兒
zh.sentence: 要找我爸爸？可以是可以啦，不過你要先幫我完成我的暑假作業，我才讓你去找爸爸。

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: Alright. Master said that the path to happiness lies in helping others. I'll lend you a hand.

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 好啊。師父說助人為快樂之本，讓我來幫你吧。

en.name: Red Child
en.sentence: Okay, before we start working on the assignment, let's find a place to sit.

zh.name: 紅孩兒
zh.sentence: 那在寫作業之前，我們先找個位置坐下吧。

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: Done!

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 完成了。

en.name: Red Child
en.sentence: Wow! Thanks Mister! Let's put the chairs back before heading to my house, shall we? Oh, and we have to keep the space clean.

zh.name: 紅孩兒
zh.sentence: 哇！謝謝你大哥哥。那我們先把座位歸還再去我們家吧！對了，要記得保持座位的清潔唷。

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: Hey Bull Demon King, sorry to disturb you, but I would like to ask you some questions, and I would appreciate if you could please answer them honestly.

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 不好意思打擾了，牛魔王先生，我想請教您一些問題，如果可以的話還請誠實回答。

en.name: Bull Demon King
en.sentence: What's the matter? Why are you so serious...?

zh.name: 牛魔王
zh.sentence: 發生什麼事了？這麼凝重⋯

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: My master has been kidnapped... so I'm looking for any clues that may be helpful. Now that you know, I'll start asking. What were you doing all day yesterday?

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 我的師父遭到綁架了⋯所以我想找尋任何有用的線索。那我就直接提問了，請問您昨天那天在做什麼呢？

en.name: Bull Demon King
en.sentence: I took my wife and my child to the theme park and we went in at about 5:00 p.m.. My family loves thrilling rides like roller coasters, haunted houses, free falls and broken track coasters. Oh, the heart-dropping sensation! The feeling of complete and utter helplessness! Oh my gosh, how I love the adrenaline pumping through my veins! The attraction that we were most looking forward to was the haunted house adventure that started at 7:30 p.m.. This was their special highlight, a hair-raising adventure for 2 hours. But I was quite disappointed, as the haunted house seemed to be a little short on spooks. I wasn't able to fully enjoy the adrenaline rush that came with being frightened.

zh.name: 牛魔王
zh.sentence: 我帶著我老婆還有小孩去遊樂園玩，我們差不多下午五點進場。我們一家人都很喜歡刺激型的遊樂設施，像是雲霄飛車、鬼屋、自由落體、斷軌這類的，讓人的心臟變得酥麻麻的感覺，真是讓人深陷其中難以自拔。原本最期待的行程是晚上七點半開始的鬼屋冒險，這是他們的特別企劃，長達兩小時的刺激探險。不過有點小可惜的是，我覺得鬼屋的鬼好像有點少，不能好好享受驚嚇的快感。

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: And after you left?

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 那離場之後呢？

en.name: Bull Demon King
en.sentence: After we were done with the haunted house, Red Child said she was sleepy, so we left the theme park. We headed back to the car park and it took us about half an hour to drive home.Oh, that's right! Here's our check-in photo at the entrance of the theme park. And here's a photo of us that we bought at the haunted house.

zh.name: 牛魔王
zh.sentence: 結束鬼屋冒險後，紅孩兒說想睡覺了，我們就直接離場。回到停車場開車，大概開了半小時到家。對了，這裡有我們在遊樂園門口的打卡圖跟我們在鬼屋買的合照。

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: Got it! Thanks for your help, Bull Demon King.It seems that Bull Demon King is a good guy. So who could the kidnapper be? No time to waste. I'd better look for someone else to ask!

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 知道了，謝謝您的協助，牛魔王先生。看來牛魔王是個好人，那誰會是抓走師父的犯人呢？

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: What a mess! Why is Spider Spirit's home so messy? Whatever...that's none of my business. I'd better hurry and head in.Spider Spirit is a likely suspect. I should ask her a few questions.Huh? That's strange, Spider Spirit is asleep in the middle of the day? Perhaps I shouldn't wake her up. Hmm... what should I do then?Ouch! What is this shiny thing? It's so bright and it's hurting my eyes!Oh, it's just a disc reflecting light. Oh well, since I can't ask Spider Spirit for information, I might as well have a look at this.

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 真是的，蜘蛛精家裡怎麼這麼亂。算了不管了，還是趕快進去。蜘蛛精感覺嫌疑重大，問問他吧。咦，大白天的蜘蛛精就在睡覺，這樣叫醒他好像不太好，該怎麼做呢⋯。唉唷！怎麼有個亮亮的東西照得我眼睛好不舒服。原來是一片光碟在反光，既然不能問蜘蛛精，那就拿來看看吧。

en.name: Spider Spirit
en.sentence: Okay, out with it. Why are you here? It'd better be something important. It's so hard to get a day off, and here you are, disturbing my beauty sleep.

zh.name: 蜘蛛精
zh.sentence: 好了，說說你是來做什麼的。最好是重要的事，難得休假，你這樣可是會打擾到我睡美容覺的時間～

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: My master disappeared yesterday. Did you, by any chance, notice anyone suspicious? Also, could you tell me what you were doing all day yesterday?

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 我的師父在昨天失蹤了，想問問你有沒有看到什麼可疑的人？還有想請問你昨天都在做些什麼呢？

en.name: Spider Spirit
en.sentence: Yesterday? I started work at 12:00 p.m. and worked for 8 hours straight. I was so tired. I was on the verge of collapsing. How would I have the energy to pay attention to such things? What's more, I was supposed to be in charge of the cashier, but because there weren't enough actors in the haunted house, I was asked to help out and act as a ghost! Tiring as hell! Once I got off work, I went to the convenience store to buy some instant noodles, and then came home to sleep. I don't have any helpful information. Please leave.

zh.name: 蜘蛛精
zh.sentence: 昨天哦，我從中午十二點連續上了八個小時的班，我都快累癱了，誰還會注意啊。而且我明明就是負責櫃檯收銀的，還因為鬼屋人手不足被叫去幫忙當鬼，累死我了。我下班後去便利商店買個泡麵就回家睡覺了，沒什麼能幫你的啦，快走吧。

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: In that case, do you have any evidence to back up what you said?

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 那你有什麼東西可以證明你說的是真的呢？

en.name: Spider Spirit
en.sentence: Augh⋯you are so annoying. Why do you have so many questions? Take a look at this. I checked in on Instagram when I was working. Oh, and this. This is my receipt from the convenience store where I had my dinner at 10:00 p.m.. These prove my innocence, right? Now hurry up and get out.

zh.name: 蜘蛛精
zh.sentence: 嘖嘖，你這人真煩，問東問西的。拿去看啦，我上班時有在IG打卡；喔還有這個，我晚上十點在便利商店買晚餐的發票。這樣可以證明我的清白了吧，快走快走。

en.name: Spider Spirit
en.sentence: Hmm...? What's that strange sound? Hey you! What're you doing?

zh.name: 蜘蛛精
zh.sentence: ⋯怎麼有奇怪的聲音？喂，你在幹什麼！

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 呃⋯呃⋯

en.name: Spider Spirit
en.sentence: You're holding my disc! You little thief! I'm calling the police to arrest you!

zh.name: 蜘蛛精
zh.sentence: 你的手上竟然還拿著我的光碟！臭小偷！我要報警把你抓起來！

en.name: Main Character
en.sentence: Hold on! I am...

zh.name: 主角
zh.sentence: 等等，我是⋯

en.name: Spider Spirit
en.sentence: Not another word! Return my stuff to where you found it now!

zh.name: 蜘蛛精
zh.sentence: 別再說了，還不快點把我的東西歸位！

hints.en: Draw the equation line segment on the transparent sheet
hints.zh: 將方程式線段畫上透明片

hints.en: Stack the transparent pieces of each part
